name: Boating - Embark on a Journey of Making Games
name_original: Boating - Embark on a Journey of Making Games
description:
This game is the game I show how to create it through the first step of Mindful Game Incubator.
(A key -> Go Left & D key -> Go Right)

Mindful Game Incubator: https://zeynabmirzadeh.com/mindful-game-incubator/
